rows.label: qst001201_msg001
rows.name: You! Hey! You!

rows.label: qst001201_msg002
rows.name:
You over there! You've inspired
me deeply! In a way I can scarcely
describe!

rows.label: qst001201_msg003
rows.name:
Ah! What a dashing profile! I'd love to
try and capture it with a sketch or two!

rows.label: qst001201_msg004
rows.name:
But as much as I'd love to immortalize
you in art... I actually have another,
more pressing request.

rows.label: qst001201_msg005
rows.name:
I was working on some landscapes,
I got a bit carried away, and before
I knew, it, I was out of paint!

rows.label: qst001201_msg006
rows.name:
I can only use special paints of the
highest quality. Actually, I concoct
them myself.

rows.label: qst001201_msg007
rows.name:
You need the right ingredients for really
vivid color. It's the foundation that my
very work is based upon.

rows.label: qst001201_msg009
rows.name:
I asked my mercenary buddy to try and
find some...

rows.label: qst001201_msg010
rows.name:
But I couldn't afford the fee. This
conflict with Superbia has really
made things expensive.

rows.label: qst001201_msg011
rows.name:
Too expensive for an impoverished
artist like myself, anyhow.

rows.label: qst001201_msg013
rows.name:
But just when I thought things were
hopeless, you appeared before me!

rows.label: qst001201_msg014
rows.name:
Yes! I would call it fate! Destiny is
like the artwork of the gods!

rows.label: qst001201_msg015
rows.name:
If I may, I would like to ask you to find
for me the ingredients that constitute
my paints.

rows.label: qst001201_msg016
rows.name:
I'm afraid I cannot offer cash. But I
will surely find you something valuable
in return for your services.

rows.label: qst001201_msg017
rows.name:
Does my offer please you?
Will you accept?

rows.label: qst001201_msg018
rows.name: Many thanks!

rows.label: qst001201_msg019
rows.name:
What I require is some Crustip
Chitin and Tricolor Rock.

rows.label: qst001201_msg020
rows.name:
I dare say Crustip Chitin can be had by
felling a Krim Crustip at Farlaine Wells.

rows.label: qst001201_msg021
rows.name:
Tricolor Rock can be found in rocky
parts of Invidia.

rows.label: qst001201_msg022
rows.name: A thousand thanks!

rows.label: qst001201_msg101
rows.name:
Oh, would that I had my paints already.
Then I could sell some paintings and
buy some food...

rows.label: qst001201_msg102
rows.name:
Oh! You need to hear about the
ingredients for the paint again?

rows.label: qst001201_msg103
rows.name:
I dare say Crustip Chitin can be had by
felling a Krim Crustip at Farlaine Wells.

rows.label: qst001201_msg104
rows.name:
Tricolor Rock can be found in rocky
parts of Invidia.

rows.label: qst001201_msg201
rows.name:
Ah! This is exactly what I require!
Magnificent!

rows.label: qst001201_msg202
rows.name:
You have assisted me greatly.
With this, I can complete my work!

rows.label: qst001201_msg203
rows.name: What should we ask?

rows.label: qst001201_msg204
rows.name: Ask what she'll do when it's complete

rows.label: qst001201_msg205
rows.name: Ask her what the hurry is

rows.label: qst001201_msg206
rows.name:
I'm hoping to sell my wares to a noble
named Isolde.

rows.label: qst001201_msg207
rows.name:
Isolde has a special love for
landscapes, and the one I'm working on
now will be irresistible to her.

rows.label: qst001201_msg208
rows.name:
If she buys it, then I won't have to keep
skipping lunch for want of coin.

rows.label: qst001201_msg210
rows.name: It's because I'm starving, clearly!

rows.label: qst001201_msg211
rows.name:
If I don't complete it, then naturally,
I won't be able to sell it. In which
eventuality, I can't buy food.

rows.label: qst001201_msg212
rows.name:
But, thanks to you, I should be able to
finish it.

rows.label: qst001201_msg213
rows.name:
I'm sure it'll fetch a handsome price.
I won't have to worry about where my
next meal is coming from for a while.

rows.label: qst001201_msg214
rows.name: Ah... I haven't given your reward yet...

rows.label: qst001201_msg215
rows.name:
Here. I'm sure this'll come in handy
one day.

rows.label: qst001201_msg216
rows.name:
No, no, thank you. Do come back! I
hope you'll let me paint you sometime!
